content:
Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 28}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "piglin_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_brick_slab, I need to place three polished_blackstone_bricks in a row in the crafting grid. The polished_blackstone_bricks are located in slot 31, so I will move one to slot 1.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 28}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "piglin_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have already placed one polished_blackstone_bricks in slot 1, so I will place the next one in slot 2.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_brick_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 26}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 28}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "piglin_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have already placed two polished_blackstone_bricks in slots 1 and 2, so I will place the last one in slot 3.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 3 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
